revised_title: Earl Baldwin of Bewdley's Contributions to Science and Public Service
tldr: This obituary highlights the life and contributions of Earl Baldwin of Bewdley, who was a prominent British politician and a supporter of science. Although he did not have a scientific background, he was a strong advocate for the advancement of science and provided significant support during his time as Prime Minister and Lord President of Council. His dedication to public service, humility, and unwavering faith made him a respected figure in both politics and science.
